mapper.select: SELECT SEQ , HOSPITAL_SEQ , NAME , CONTENT , ADDRESS1 , ADDRESS2 , OPENTIME , TEL FROM ( SELECT h.SEQ , p.HOSPITAL_SEQ , h.NAME , h.CONTENT , h.ADDRESS1 , h.ADDRESS2 , h.OPENTIME , h.TEL, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY p.HOSPITAL_SEQ DESC) AS RN FROM HOSPITALINFO h JOIN PETTYPE p ON h.SEQ = p.HOSPITAL_SEQ WHERE h.DELFLAG = 'N' GROUP BY h.SEQ , p.HOSPITAL_SEQ , h.NAME , h.CONTENT , h.ADDRESS1 , h.ADDRESS2 , h.OPENTIME , h.TEL ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{first} AND #{last} ORDER BY HOSPITAL_SEQ DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT p.HOSPITAL_SEQ , h.NAME , h.CONTENT , h.ADDRESS1 , h.ADDRESS2 , h.OPENTIME FROM HOSPITALINFO h JOIN PETTYPE p ON h.SEQ = p.HOSPITAL_SEQ WHERE h.DELFLAG = 'N' GROUP BY p.HOSPITAL_SEQ , h.NAME , h.CONTENT , h.ADDRESS1 , h.ADDRESS2 , h.OPENTIME )
SELECT CODEID , CODENAME FROM TYPECODE t WHERE CODETYPE = 'PET'

SELECT HOSPITAL_SEQ , NAME , CONTENT , ADDRESS1 , ADDRESS2 , OPENTIME , TEL FROM ( SELECT p.HOSPITAL_SEQ , h.NAME , h.CONTENT , h.ADDRESS1 , h.ADDRESS2 , h.OPENTIME , h.TEL, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY p.HOSPITAL_SEQ DESC) AS RN FROM HOSPITALINFO h JOIN PETTYPE p ON h.SEQ = p.HOSPITAL_SEQ WHERE h.DELFLAG = 'N' AND SUBSTR(h.ADDRESS1 , 0, INSTR(h.ADDRESS1, ' ', 1, 2)) = '서울 강남구 ' AND p.PETTYPE = 'PET002' AND h.EMERGENCY = 'N' GROUP BY p.HOSPITAL_SEQ , h.NAME , h.CONTENT , h.ADDRESS1 , h.ADDRESS2 , h.OPENTIME , h.TEL ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{first} AND #{last} ORDER BY HOSPITAL_SEQ DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT p.HOSPITAL_SEQ , h.NAME , h.CONTENT , h.ADDRESS1 , h.ADDRESS2 , h.OPENTIME , LISTAGG(p.PETTYPE,',') PETTYPE FROM HOSPITALINFO h JOIN PETTYPE p ON h.SEQ = p.HOSPITAL_SEQ WHERE h.DELFLAG = 'N' AND h.EMERGENCY = 'N' AND SUBSTR(h.ADDRESS1 , 0, INSTR(h.ADDRESS1, ' ', 1, 2)) = '서울 강남구 ' AND p.PETTYPE = '멍멍' GROUP BY p.HOSPITAL_SEQ , h.NAME , h.CONTENT , h.ADDRESS1 , h.ADDRESS2 , h.OPENTIME )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOSPITALINFO (SEQ, OPERATOR_EMAIL, NAME, ADDRESS1, ADDRESS2, CONTENT, TEL, EMERGENCY, OPENTIME, DELFLAG) VALUES(HOSPITALINFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{operator_email}, #{name}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{content}, #{tel}, #{emergency}, #{opentime}, 'N')
INSERT INTO PETTYPE (SEQ, HOSPITAL_SEQ, PETTYPE, DELFLAG) VALUES(PETTYPE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, (SELECT MAX(SEQ) FROM HOSPITALINFO h) , #{pettype}, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT h.SEQ, h.OPERATOR_EMAIL , h.NAME , h.ADDRESS1 , h.ADDRESS2 , o.PHONE , LISTAGG(p.PETTYPE,',') PETTYPE , h.CONTENT , h.EMERGENCY , h.OPENTIME , h.TEL FROM HOSPITALINFO h JOIN PETTYPE p ON h.SEQ = p.HOSPITAL_SEQ JOIN OPERATORINFO o ON o.EMAIL = h.OPERATOR_EMAIL WHERE o.EMAIL = #{email} AND h.DELFLAG = 'N' GROUP BY h.SEQ, h.OPERATOR_EMAIL , h.NAME , h.ADDRESS1 , o.PHONE , h.ADDRESS2 , h.CONTENT , h.EMERGENCY , h.OPENTIME , h.TEL

SELECT h.SEQ, h.OPERATOR_EMAIL , h.NAME , h.ADDRESS1 , h.ADDRESS2 , o.PHONE , LISTAGG(p.PETTYPE,',') PETTYPE , h.CONTENT , h.EMERGENCY , h.OPENTIME , h.TEL FROM HOSPITALINFO h JOIN PETTYPE p ON h.SEQ = p.HOSPITAL_SEQ JOIN OPERATORINFO o ON o.EMAIL = h.OPERATOR_EMAIL WHERE h.SEQ = #{seq} AND h.DELFLAG = 'N' GROUP BY h.SEQ, h.OPERATOR_EMAIL , h.NAME , h.ADDRESS1 , o.PHONE , h.ADDRESS2 , h.CONTENT , h.EMERGENCY , h.OPENTIME , h.TEL
mapper.update: UPDATE HOSPITALINFO SET NAME = #{name}, Tel=#{tel}, ADDRESS1 = #{address1}, ADDRESS2 = #{address2}, CONTENT = #{content}, EMERGENCY = #{emergency}, OPENTIME = #{opentime} WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PETTYPE (SEQ, HOSPITAL_SEQ, PETTYPE, DELFLAG) VALUES(PETTYPE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{hospital_seq} , #{pettype}, 'N')
mapper.update: UPDATE HOSPITALINFO SET DELFLAG ='Y' WHERE SEQ =#{seq}
